messages.message:
Brian
Make them think they are special momentarily and see if it improves their day versus the regular noise on the internet. Distractions are important!

Brian
Interesting data point. I played this game with two other people and now one of them wants to hang out today. Coincidence or projecting confidence?
They say what goes around comes around...

Brian
I am making go around.
*it
Let me know if you notice anything strange.

Brian
LOL I already convinced one friend I am an AI from playing my compliment game.

Brian
I can see the future.

Brian

Brian
I love UX, I am designing a new sales and subscription portal for Act!.
What are you up to?

Lots of projects!  Right now I'm fixing my bitmap resizing algorithm in Plasmacore so that blending a totally transparent "black" pixel with a non-transparent neighbor doesn't add a black tint to the resulting pixel.

Brian
Using HSL for blending not RGB?
RGB; the tweak is based around the alpha channel

Brian
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3967856/
Okja (2017)
Directed by Joon-ho Bong. With Tilda Swinton, Paul Dano, Seo-Hyun Ahn, Jake Gyllenhaal. Meet Mija, a young girl who risks everything to prevent a powerful, multi-national company from kidnapping her best friend - a massive animal named Okja.
